ðŸ“– Summary: AgentHeroes is a platform for generating, animating, and scheduling AI characters. It allows users to train LoRA models, generate images and videos, and automate the entire process through agentic flows, triggered by schedule or API. The platform currently supports scheduling videos to X (formerly Twitter).
